title: About Ranked
body:
This is my first time playing league and I would like to know how many games I have to play a week in order for my account not decay.
in addition how do you get points in ranked?
and if I get into gold will my account decay past gold into silver?
please tell me. 
:)

replies.body:
You won't decay unless you get plat or above, so I wouldn't worry about it.

That being said, if you just hit 30 for the first time, I'd recommend you go play some draft games (on the order of 100-200 wins) before you pop in to ranked, or you're kinda setting yourself up for failure.

oh ok thank you
so your positive if I get to gold I cant decay into silver?

> [{quoted}](name=mobius1galm16,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qHN4uWzO,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2014-12-17T18:02:10.431+0000)
>
> oh ok thank you
> so your positive if I get to gold I cant decay into silver?

Yes. From [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752994-2014-Season-Ranked-FAQ#h5q1):

>Decay does not occur for players in Bronze, Silver, and Gold.
at least one game a week, and you gain league point by winning ranked games, you lose league point by losing ranked game. Decay can take you from gold to silver, yes

thank you for telling me :)
its nice to see people in the community helping others

They changed it late last season,  previously only bronze was immune from inactivity decay,  but now silver and gold are immune from inactivity decay as well.  So only Platinum and above will be punished for not playing ranked Games regularly.
